message.body: Hey! What's up?
Hey rose12.. Just done with an important meeting. How about yourself?
About to go to the art museum with my daughter. :)
Awesome. How old is she? What type of art?
She's almost two. It is the art museum on campus, so it's just a mixture of time periods, areas, and styles. Our favorite room is the African art room. :)
Cool. I hope u enjoy it
Are u an artist yourself?
No. I'm a linguist. Haha.
Haha ... Me too.. What do u work on?
Bantu languages. Specifically in Zone S. You?
Slavic syntax and psycholing. R u a grad student?
Ooh, Slavic syntax is really fascinating. I studied Serbian for awhile, but I could never get the aspectual part down. Yup. You?
I am a native speaker of it ;) but i know it is a difficult concept for non- natives. the same goes for articles in the other direction. where did u study serbian?
And yes, i am a grad student
I studied it at UW-Madison... Well, technically we learned "Serbo-Croatian", but our teachers were both from Serbia and we did most things in cyrillic.
Yeah- the language name is constantly changing :) did u enjoy it? Have u ever been to serbia/ croatia/bosnia?
I did enjoy it! I wish there were more people I could speak with. I've never been over there, but my friend's dad is from Croatia and I might go next summer.
Awesome! Croatian seaside is gorgeous! Have u used it since u stopped taking classes?
Unfortunately I really only use it when talking with my friend Lika and soometimes on the internet..
If you need someone to chat with, you can contact me :) hows ur research coming along ?
It's slow but pretty steady. haha. I still have a long way to go. How is your research coming along?
I hear u. I'm hoping to finish the coming semester but we shall see :) what r ur plans afterwards?
